name: Your social icons
author: Erik Dukker, Eduk.nl

sections.description:
Your social icons, use the icons you want and fit them perfect in you pages / posts

The social icons plugin for professionals: optimized positioning and sizing, lean / light / fast, open to use own icons and url’s, share content or pages, shortcodes

Two setting screens: basics for non experts. Ready for use defaults, easy settings. Specify selection / order icons
more for experts define url’s, specify your iconstrip and custom css.

An iconstrip is 6 icons in png format (tranperancy) horizontal combined in 1 png
Example iconstrips, documentation and a tool to build your own are available at http://Eduk.nl/ysi/

Donations
sections.installation:
Plugin Search:

  • In /wp-admin/, go to Plugins > Add New
  • Search for “Your social icons”
  • Look for “Your social icons?
  • Click “Install Now?
  • After installation has completed, click “Activate Plugin?

short_description: Use (your) icons to share content or links to your pages with a professional look and feel.
